Html:
Hi,

I would like to know if it's possible to draw a polygon, and then, to remove another polygon from the inside.

I'd like to create this kind of shape (like the green one)

http://www.forestpal.com/Help/images/poly7.png

I cannot just place a white one in the middle of the green one because I want to see the background (a map).

Thanks a lot
i guess you need a custom overlay with overridden function DrawPolygons to make holes
